onna paminille pitapathakuth ganna oone kiyala kandige ayiya kiwwa.ha sar kiyala menna ara aththi api liyanna oone liyun karadahiyath kadadasiyakuth hoyana awith eyama liyala athsana gahanna witharak onna kandita dunna.hane hapoyi....onna ithin ee welawe tayip gahanna kenek natheyi kiyala api ahawal welawe ara sarge athatama meka genath dennam kiyala megolla wannde nathi eka witharayi.onna ithin dan kandiyi ayiyayi enna pitath wennayi lasthiya.menna aayeth polime aththo aththiyo dennek awith onna kandige ayiyata kiyanawa ane sar api danagena hitiye na sarla ahawal sarge mallila kiyala sarla methana tika welawak hitiya kiyala ahawal sartanam kiyanna epa kiyala illuwa.onna ithin kandige ayiyath kiwwa ha ha baya wenta e pa ya kiyala.

mage pasal kalayayi , ada wassayi gana katha karanne mokadayi kiyala dan balawi ..mekayi hethuwa , ee dawas wala mage panthiye hitapu mithrayangen ek ayek ada liyanna hadana mathrukawata bandunu nisa , api aththa nama nokiya , eeta wada prasiddha nama kiyannam ko ....“wadu patta....“ ..ee dawas wala ithin “ wadu patta “ kiwwoth nodanna kenek nathi tharam , danagath widiyata , mage mithrayage thaththa ‘wadu karmiyek“ ...ithin eyage patiya “wadu patiya “ wenna athi , eeta passe adareta “wadu patta “ wenna athi ne ....dan onna matath kiyanna epa me dawas wala sinhala blog parishraye siddha wena “hela pada bedili “ wage wadak kala kiyala ...(ee gana nam , ee kiwe sinhala pada wiwidhakara wikararupi lesin wigraha karanamin karana , wikruthi rasa windanaya bowena ledak wagema bowana bawak danenawa ) pittaniye mayima ...sathute mayima nowu dan “ape wadu pattage“ katha wasthuwa ......ee dawas wala mage me mithraya hari prasiddhayi iskole purawatama , mokada hamadamath wage mokak hari ledak dagena thamayi gedara yanne , meyata leda danna waradi karaya thamayi , ape iskole pittaniya kelaware thibunu , bohoma nisala , muhudu thiraya , kilo mitarayak withara muda paththata payin awida gena yanna puluwan me koral pare dige katath horen awidagena yanna , honda thanak balala anga tikak thema ganna nohithenne mona kolu patiyatada .....? ..
